mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM choongang.favorite f WHERE f.member_email = #{member_email}
SELECT f.*, l.lesson_thumbnail, l.lesson_price FROM choongang.favorite f JOIN choongang.lesson l ON f.lesson_number = l.lesson_number WHERE f.member_email = #{member_email}

SELECT * FROM choongang.payment p LEFT JOIN choongang.lesson l ON p.lesson_number = l.lesson_number LEFT JOIN choongang.reply r ON l.lesson_number = r.lesson_number WHERE p.member_email = #{member_email} AND p.payment_state = '1' ORDER BY p.lesson_number, r.write_date DESC;
mapper.delete: DELETE member, lesson FROM member LEFT JOIN lesson ON member.member_email = lesson.member_email WHERE member.member_email = #{member_email}
